Text: I just want to ask, when does the connection with 'halor.master.gamespy.com' come up? All ive seen is 'halor.ms6.gamespy.com'. Other than that, it workd just fine. Thanks!

dude, what is the product code, 
?????

I Really wanna download this does it work?

if it does lets get some seeders!!!
@pranav429 Register with any SN, 4 segments of 4 chars, without 1, i, o or 0 (allowed chars are: ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZ23456789)
Does the online work for the halo for not???

Drop to Halo.app Applications Folder

Register with any SN, 4 segments of 4 chars, without 1,i,o or 0
 (allowed chars are: ABCDEFGHJKLMNPQRSTUVWXYZ23456789)

Setup Little Snitch to allow any connection, but deny "halor.master.gamespy.com"

Setup OSX firewall to allow incoming connections

Play online using direct IP with your friends

(optionnally: forward ports 2302-2303 in your router)
Works Great On iAtkos L2 with EVGA 520GT 2GB. Have Fun..
